title: Worlds Pick'em
body:
What happens if i win and already have all the ultimate skins?
What do i get then?

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

You're not gifted the skins directly. You're given a Hextech Crafting cache containing the 3 ultimate skins. 

If you already own the 3 skins, then you  still have the option to re-roll them or disenchant them for loads of yellow essence.

More info [here](http://pickem.oce.lolesports.com/en-AU#how-to-play).
